Summary: A large yellowish-white pulsating light caught our attention.
divs: sighting detailswe were driving back from a party when we saw a large pulsating yellowish\white light in the sky. at first i though it could be a headlamp from an airplane but the duration and characteristics seemed to void that. another thought was a planet but i have never seen a planet in that direction (nw) nor have i seen one pulsate like this one. it began at about 40 degrees on the horizon and slowly sunk to a mere 10 degrees or so over 20 minutes. i am always keeping my eye to the sky so this really caught my attention. i have seen objects in the past but i don't like to report much anymore yet this seemed to warrant a report and i was able to capture three separate videos which i have posted with this report. we had some pics but they turned out way to smeared during to a moving vehicle to be of use. my wife and i eventually lost sight since it ducked behind a distant hill. at 40 secs into the "mufon2" video you see it peak through the trees over the rogue river as we crossed the bridge in town.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
